caption.center: Cory ANDERSON and Cary Anderson Individually and as Personal
Representatives of the Estate of Gregory J. Anderson, Appellants, v.
HEARTLAND GOLF DEVELOPMENT II, LLC, Respondent.

court.center: Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court of Jackson County, Missouri, Marco A. Roldan, Judge.Page 733
opinion.attorneys:
Brian J. Madden and Diane Watkins, Kansas City, MO, for appellants.
Michelle R. Stewart and Peter Maharry, Overland Park, KS, for respondent.
opinion.panel: Before Division Three: JAMES M. SMART, JR., Presiding Judge, JOSEPH M. ELLIS, Judge and GARY D. WITT, Judge.
opinion.opinion_text:
Cory and Cary Anderson appeal the judgment of the circuit court, which granted summary judgment in favor of Heart-land Golf Development II, LLC.
We affirm. Rule 84.16(b). A memorandum setting forth the reasons for this order has been provided to the parties.
